name: The Road
description:
After a car accident, the protagonist wakes up at a motel. He needs to solve some puzzles to escape the motel, and continue living.

EDIT: This was a One-week-challenge game - so except some bugs along the way ;)

Controls:

WASD + Mouse

Mouse 1: interact

Mouse 2: investigate

Objective:

Escape the Motel, using a vehicle - Good luck

If anyone is interested, I've uploaded videos documenting the process of development for this game: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tS0BoB6QGcc
